price: Allah Yã yi wa'adi ga waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai. Sunã da wata gãfara da lãda mai girma.
arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waʿada al-lahu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun ʿaẓīmun
